onboarding_desc_1: Take the OCEAN quiz and learn your traits.
onboarding_desc_2: Chat with the assistant to reflect on your feelings.
onboarding_desc_3: Share a code and explore similarities together.
insights_empty: Start a conversation to see insights.
settings_about: Mind Mirror helps you explore personality and emotions through playful, science-inspired interactions.
invite_description: Share your code to compare personalities instantly.
tips_openness: You thrive on new ideas and creative adventures.
tips_conscientiousness: You value structure and follow through on plans.
tips_extraversion: You recharge through social energy and interaction.
tips_agreeableness: Empathy guides you to build warm connections.
tips_neuroticism: You are self-aware and tune into emotional shifts.
home_quiz_desc: Answer 25 mindful prompts to unlock your personality blueprint.
home_insights_desc: Reflect with the emotion guide and track your daily tone.
home_compare_desc: Swap codes with friends to see where your traits intersect.
home_tagline: Your curated space to explore personality, emotions, and growth.
features_subtitle: Toggle labs and prototypes to shape Mind Mirror around your flow.
results_intro: Your scores blossom across the Big Five spectrum.
insights_intro: Share what is on your mind to reveal the emotional fingerprint.
compare_intro: Swap codes to compare Big Five traits side by side.
compare_waiting: Generate or enter a 6-digit code to unlock the comparison dashboard.
feature_daily_reflection_desc: Receive gentle nudges to record your mood and keep momentum.
feature_weekly_trends_desc: Visualise how your OCEAN profile evolves every week.
feature_emotion_heatmap_desc: Turn chat transcripts into a bar chart of five core feelings.
feature_quick_mood_desc: Tap a single emotion to log a fast check-in.
feature_breathing_coach_desc: Guided inhale and exhale rhythms appear before intense quizzes.
feature_affirmation_library_desc: Browse curated affirmations aligned to each personality trait.
feature_social_share_desc: Generate polished cards for sharing results with friends.
feature_offline_questions_desc: Access the full OCEAN prompts even without internet.
feature_theme_scheduler_desc: Schedule automatic light or dark theme by your routine.
feature_voice_input_desc: Dictate reflections hands-free using your microphone.
feature_chat_history_desc: Revisit past chats and pick up insights where you left off.
feature_export_pdf_desc: Download a printable personality report for your records.
feature_compare_timeline_desc: Track how your friend matches change over multiple sessions.
feature_home_widgets_desc: Pin streaks and quick actions directly on your device home screen.
feature_assistant_shortcuts_desc: Add Siri or Assistant commands to start quizzes instantly.
feature_haptics_desc: Subtle vibrations accompany key actions for tactile feedback.
feature_quiz_tips_desc: Show supportive hints while answering personality items.
feature_reverse_helper_desc: Highlight statements that count in reverse to avoid confusion.
feature_streak_tracker_desc: You have logged reflections for {count} days in a row.
feature_onboarding_recaps_desc: Replay the onboarding narrative any time from settings.
feature_avatar_gallery_desc: Choose from expressive avatars to represent your mood.
feature_high_contrast_desc: Boost colour contrast for sharper readability.
feature_reduced_motion_desc: Simplify animations for a calmer, low-motion experience.
feature_data_control_desc: Clamp text scaling and manage privacy preferences.
feature_sleep_mode_desc: Dim colours after sunset for night-time reflection.
feature_notification_digest_desc: Receive a single weekly summary of activity and invites.
feature_notebook_integration_desc: Export insights to your journaling or notes apps.
feature_custom_questions_desc: Author your own prompts to add into the OCEAN quiz.
feature_focus_mode_desc: Hide extra entry points to stay concentrated on the quiz.
feature_calendar_sync_desc: Sync reflection reminders with your calendar schedule.
